name: Outlook Rules Wizard File
summary: Learn about .RWZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Rules files are often used for automatically deleting SPAM messages, and they also commonly used for organizing incoming email into different folders. For example, a user could specify that all email having an unrecognized sender could be filed to an "unknown" email inbox.

RWZ files are maintained automatically by Outlook. However, if you want to export rules, choose Tools → Rules Wizard → Options and select "Export Rules" from the dialog box. You can also import existing rules by selecting "Import Rules" and choosing an RWZ file.

description: Email rules file created by Microsoft Outlook, an email and calendar application; stores email filters, which specify actions to take for email messages that match a certain set of criteria; stores all rules for an email account.
